attributes.action: order the closure of the Scientology Mission of York with immediate effect
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
With the growing hysteria surrounding Scientology, York is now playing host to one of their "Churches".
Scientology is increasing in the UK and no one is doing anything about it. Things must change and York must make a stand against this American-import religion.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
